name: Raspberry Blue
description:
I wanted to make an ADV berry juice for the summer so I've picked OOO Blue raspberry candy, TPA raspberry sweet and FW blueberry. I've added a little bit of FA lemon sicily to boost the berries and sour to the berries. 
If you got the flavors and you like berries then you should try to mix this.

Note: is shake n vape
author: vagdal

reviews.text: That Malic Acid at 1.5% is going to rip right through that. You got a good base going, although Raspberry sweet + SS + FW is EM overload, and I'd guess OOO too, but I don't know if they release SMS sheets, however I'm going to pick that flavor up now that bullcity carries it. If you have INW Raspberry (malina/shisha), combo them would be best or fw razzleberry try that instead of the TPA and see what you think of it because I bet it'll improve 10 fold. If you want any suggestions or questions as I'm very familiar with the profile PM me and I'd be glad to help.
